data.trans: Một nhân viên có kinh nghiệm
data.trans_hint: Anh ấy là một nhân viên có kinh nghiệm ở công ty tôi.
data.en_hint: He is an experienced staff in my company.
data.content_game_1: He is an experienced staff in my company.
data.answer_en_hint: He is an experienced staff in my company.

data.trans_hint: Anh ta chẳng làm gì ngoài chỉ trích nguời khác.
data.en_hint: He doesn't do anything except for criticizing others.
data.content_game_1: He doesn't do anything except for criticizing others.
data.answer_en_hint: He doesn't do anything except for criticizing others.

data.content: make huge contributions to the firm
data.trans: Có đóng góp lớn cho doanh nghiệp
data.trans_hint: Cô ấy đã có những đóng góp lớn cho doanh nghiệm trong năm nay.
data.en_hint: She has made huge contributions to the firm this year.

data.answer_en_hint: She has made huge contributions to the firm this year.

data.trans_hint: Bị xao lãng bởi tiếng nhạc, cô ấy không thể tập trung vào học.
data.en_hint: Being distracted by the music, she cannot focus on studying.
data.content_game_1: Being distracted by the music, she cannot focus on studying.
data.answer_en_hint: Being distracted by the music, she cannot focus on studying.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy gặp một vài rắc rối với đồng nghiệp của mình và phải tìm một công việc mới.
data.en_hint: She runs into some problems with her colleagues and has to find another job.
data.content_game_1: She runs into some problems with her colleagues and has to find another job.
data.answer_en_hint: She runs into some problems with her colleagues and has to find another job.

data.trans: Kết quả của sự cố gắng
data.trans_hint: Kết quả của sự cố gắng đã được ghi nhận bởi sếp của cô ấy.
data.en_hint: Her efforts have been acknowledged by her boss.
data.content_game_1: Her efforts have been acknowledged by her boss.
data.answer_en_hint: Her efforts have been acknowledged by her boss.

data.trans_hint: Tôi sẽ cố gắng về đúng giờ, nhưng tôi không hứa trước nhé!
data.en_hint: I'll try to get back in time, but I'm not making any promises.
data.content_game_1: I'll try to get back in time, but I'm not making any promises.
data.answer_en_hint: I'll try to get back in time, but I'm not making any promises.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy tập trung vào việc học thay vì mải mê yêu anh ta.
data.en_hint: She chooses to focus on her study instead of falling in love with him.
data.content_game_1: She chooses to focus on her study instead of falling in love with him.
data.answer_en_hint: She chooses to focus on her study instead of falling in love with him.

data.trans_hint: Học sinh cho vị giáo sư của mình nhận xét sau buổi học.
